attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE WANT LIFE FOR MURDER AND MUTILATION.
WE BELIVE THAT JUSTICE IS NOT BEING DONE WE THINK IT SHOULD BE LIFE FOR LIFE AS IT IS AFFECTING THE VICTIM FAMILYS AS WE LIVING LIFE SENTENCES

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
